description: This file defines the RootTabScaffold widget, which is a stateless widget implementing a bottom tab navigation layout for the main sections of a Flutter app. It sets up a DefaultTabController with four tabs, each corresponding to a specific screen (Events, Birthdays, Messages, Profile), and styles the bottom navigation bar accordingly.

classes.name: RootTabScaffold
classes.description: A stateless widget providing a bottom tab navigation interface for the application, displaying four main screens via TabBarView.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the RootTabScaffold, setting up the tab controller, scaffold, and bottom navigation bar.
